name: Plucklings
description:
Plucklings is a procedural- generated, top- down strategy game where you gather you plucklings, attack the hostile and dangerous wildlife, and then carry the remains back to your base. Fight giant boss creatures and recover the lost ship parts around the map to win the game.

Default controls (can be configured while playing)

Walk right: D

Walk left: A

Walk up: W

Walk down: S

Sprint: Left shift

Save game (while being close to the space ship): Q

Pluck plucklings: E

Move on the the next area (while being close to the space ship): R

Skip current day: T

Select plucklings: left mouse button

Throw plucklings: Right mouse button

Pet plucklings: P

Pause: Escape

Manually select plucklings: Spacebar

Open building menu: Tab

Jetpack: J

Feedback

If there's anything you'd like to let me know, then feel free to tell me in the comments.

Credits:

Programming, visuals, sound effects, etc: Oskar Jagstedt

Music: Poor Alexie (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Poor_Alexei_1268...)
